name: Creeper Nightmare: Season 0
description:
Season 0 - is a prologue that will introduce the player to the Creeper Nightmare series, and will allow you to find out the origin of the monster, which the locals perceive as a cursed deity... Plunge into a terrible night that will set off a chain of events - which will not give anyone any hope of surviving until the morning... .
Take on the role of an ordinary traveler who, according to the plot, finds himself in less than ideal circumstances. Find a way to escape from the farm by solving the owners' riddles and surviving the monster's attacks...
You have at your disposal all the items that you can pick up, use Physical Grab with your cursor to pick up key items and deliver them where you need them, you can also pick up any physical items to defend yourself...
The game is in early access.
